org.miktim.websocket

Interface WsServer.Handler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    WsConnection.Handler
    Enclosing class:
    WsServer

    public static interface WsServer.Handler
extends WsConnection.Handler
    WebSocket server event handler extends connection handler.

      Called when the server is ready to accept connections.
